commit.message:
Update packages, improve UI, and enhance documentation

- Updated `WebSpark.Bootswatch` package version to `1.0.6`.
- Modified `HttpClientDecorator.Web.csproj` to add new build properties and reorder package references.
- Enhanced titles and layout in several `.cshtml` files for better clarity and responsiveness.
- Improved theme handling in `_Layout.cshtml` and `_ThemeInfo.cshtml`, including session management.
- Added new documentation pages for `WebSpark.Bootswatch` and `WebSpark.HttpClientUtility`.
- Introduced `ThemeHelper.cs` for managing theme settings and user preferences.

Add Bootswatch integration and theme management features

- Updated package references for WebSpark.Bootswatch and WebSpark.HttpClientUtility.
- Enhanced Index.cshtml to include theme information and color mode toggle.
- Modified _Layout.cshtml to support dynamic theme switching.
- Implemented JavaScript functionality for color mode toggle and theme persistence.
- Created _ThemeInfo.cshtml to display current theme and available options.
- Updated Program.cs to register Bootswatch services.

Updated site crawler and helper methods, added new methods

Updated the domain string in `Program.cs` and the `circuitBreakerPolicy` syntax. Enhanced `SimpleSiteCrawler.cs` by including new namespaces, changing `AddCrawlResult` to an instance method, and adding new methods for saving page content, generating safe filenames, and resolving relative links. Improved `WriteToCsv` in `SiteCrawlerHelpers.cs` to handle special characters and exclude certain properties.
